name: Radio
description: Radio component for single selection from a group. Only one radio in a group can be selected at a time. Extends MUI Radio with custom styling.

props.name: checked
props.description: If true, the component is checked

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component will be disabled

examples.title: Basic
examples.code:
import { Radio, RadioGroup, FormControlLabel } from '@/components';

<RadioGroup value="option1">
  <FormControlLabel value="option1" control={<Radio />} label="Option 1" />
  <FormControlLabel value="option2" control={<Radio />} label="Option 2" />
</RadioGroup>

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Radio with design system Radio. Use within RadioGroup for proper behavior.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Arrow keys navigate between radios in a group, Space selects
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Radio label, checked state, and group context are announced

whenToUse: When all options should be visible
bestPractices: Use a group label for the set
